Producer: Evan Astrowsky, Christopher Lemole, Tim Zajaros
Production Co: Pelican Point Media, Dragonfly Entertainment, Armory Films, Contend, Elevated
Rating: R (Language|Horror Violence and Gore|Nudity|Sexuality|Some Drug Use)
Synopsis: Fresh out of college, five friends (Nadine Crocker, Matthew Daddario, Samuel Davis) face the horrors of a flesh-eating virus while staying at a remote cabin.
Title: Cabin Fever
